metadata.title: 3vantage Aquascaping - Join the Revolution
metadata.description: Get early access to professional aquascaping tools that will transform your underwater landscapes. Join our exclusive waitlist today.

hero.title: Join the Aquascaping Revolution
hero.subtitle: Transform your underwater world with professional-grade tools designed for aquascaping enthusiasts and experts alike.
hero.description: Get early access to cutting-edge aquascaping software that will revolutionize how you design, plan, and maintain your aquatic masterpieces.

features.title: Why Aquascaping Professionals Choose 3vantage
features.subtitle: Discover the tools that will elevate your aquascaping to new heights

design.title: 3D Aquascape Designer
design.description: Visualize your aquascape in stunning 3D before you build. Plan every plant, rock, and decoration with precision.

calculator.title: Smart Calculation Tools
calculator.description: Calculate CO2, lighting, fertilizers, and water parameters automatically. Never guess again.

community.title: Expert Community
community.description: Connect with professional aquascapers worldwide. Share designs, get feedback, and learn from the best.

waitlist.title: Secure Your Early Access
waitlist.subtitle: Be among the first to experience the future of aquascaping

gdpr.consent: I consent to receive updates about the 3vantage platform launch and understand I can unsubscribe at any time.

testimonials.title: Loved by Aquascaping Enthusiasts
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of aquascapers who are already transforming their craft

items.name: Marcus Chen
items.content: The 3D visualization tools are game-changing. I can show clients exactly what their aquascape will look like before we start.

items.name: Elena Petrov
items.content: Finally, a tool that takes the guesswork out of aquascaping. The calculation features alone are worth the wait.

items.name: James Thompson
items.content: This will revolutionize how we help customers plan their aquascapes. Can't wait for the full release!
